meanings.sent1: She misreferred the book title in her report.
meanings.sent2: The librarian misreferred the student to the wrong section.
meanings.sent3: He misreferred the recipe and ended up with a strange dish.
meanings.sent4: The compass misreferred north, leading them off course.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide misreferred the historical date, causing confusion among the visitors.

meanings.definition: To mistakenly direct someone to the wrong source or person.
meanings.sent1: The receptionist misreferred the customer to the closed store.
meanings.sent2: I misreferred my friend to the incorrect meeting spot.
meanings.sent3: The GPS misreferred us to a dead-end street.
meanings.sent4: Her sense of direction misreferred her like a faulty compass.
meanings.sent5: The teacher misreferred the student to the wrong textbook, causing frustration.
